monsters.name: Belashyrra
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_resistances: poison, psychic
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, exhaustion, frightened, poisoned, prone

traits.name: Alien Mind
traits.desc: If a creature tries to read Belashyrra's thoughts or deals psychic damage to it, that creature must succeed on a 22 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Eye Thief
traits.desc: Belashyrra can see through the eyes of all creatures within 120 feet of it. It can use its Eye Ray through any creature within 120 feet of it, as though it were in that creature's space.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Belashyrra fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Belashyrra has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Belashyrra regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Belashyrra dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Teleport
traits.desc: As a bonus action, Belashyrra can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Belashyrra makes two attacks with its claws and uses its Eye Ray once.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (3d6 + 7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Eye Ray
actions.desc: Belashyrra shoots one of the following magical eye rays of its choice, targeting one creature it can see within 120 feet of it:

actions.name: 1. Psyche-Reconstruction Ray
actions.desc: The target must make a 22 Wisdom saving throw, taking 49 (9d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If this damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, it dies and transforms into a spectator under Belashyrra's control and acts immediately after Belashyrra in the initiative order. The target can't be returned to its original form by any means short of a wish spell.

actions.name: 2. Domination Ray
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 22 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by Belashyrra for 1 minute or until the target takes damage. Belashyrra can issue telepathic commands to the charmed creature (no action required), which it does its best to obey.

actions.name: 3. Mind-Weakening Ray
actions.desc: The target must succeed on a 22 Intelligence saving throw or take 36 (8d8) psychic damage and be unable to cast spells or activate magic items for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: 4. Blinding Ray
actions.desc: The target and each creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a 22 Constitution saving throw or take 19 (3d12) radiant damage and be blinded for 1 minute. Until this blindness ends, Belyshyrra can see through the blinded creature's eyes. The blinded creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

legendary_actions.name: Claw
legendary_actions.desc: Belashyrra makes one claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Implant Fear (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Belashyrra targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 22 Wisdom saving throw or take 22 (4d10) psychic damage and immediately use its reaction, if available, to move as far as its speed allows away from Belashyrra.

legendary_actions.name: Rend Reality (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Belashyrra rips at the bonds of reality in its immediate area. Each creature within 10 feet of Belashyrra must succeed on a 22 Constitution saving throw or take 19 (3d12) force damage and gain one level of exhaustion.

monsters.name: Bone Knight
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.alignment: lawful neutral (law/chaos axis) chaotic neutral (good/evil axis) evil
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, poison

traits.name: Commander of Bones
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the knight can target one skeleton or zombie it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target must obey the knight's commands until the knight dies or until the knight releases it as a bonus action. The knight can command up to twelve undead at a time this way.

traits.name: Master of the Pallid Banner
traits.desc: While within 60 feet of the knight, any undead ally of the knight has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The knight attacks twice with one of its weapons.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

spells: The knight is an 8th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following paladin spells prepared:

spells.1st level (4 slots): command, compelled duel, hellish rebuke, wrathful smite

spells.2nd level (3 slots): branding smite, crown of madness, darkness, find steed, magic weapon

monsters.name: Changeling
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.languages: Common, Dwarvish, Elvish, Halfling, Thieves' cant

traits.name: Change Appearance
traits.desc: The changeling can use its action to polymorph into a Medium humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The changeling makes two attacks with its dagger.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Unsettling Visage (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.desc: Each creature within 30 feet of the changeling must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Clawfoot
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The clawfoot has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the clawfoot's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Pounce
traits.desc: If the clawfoot moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the clawfoot can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The clawfoot makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Corrin Delmaco
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

monsters.name: Dolgaunt
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.senses: blindsight 120 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 14

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: If the dolgaunt is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the dolgaunt instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it's incapacitated.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.desc: While the dolgaunt is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dolgaunt makes two tentacle attacks and two unarmed strikes. Up to two tentacle attacks can be replaced by Vitality Drain.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. The target is grappled (escape 12) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the dolgaunt can't use the same tentacle on another target. The dolgaunt has two tentacles.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Vitality Drain
actions.desc: One creature grappled by a tentacle of the dolgaunt must make a 11 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 9 (2d8) necrotic damage, and the dolgaunt regains a number of hit points equal to half the necrotic damage taken.

monsters.name: Dolgrim
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.name: Dual Consciousness
traits.desc: The dolgrim has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dolgrim makes three attacks.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Dusk Hag
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The hag has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hag makes two Nightmare Touch attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Nightmare Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 18 (4d6 + 4) psychic damage. If the target is unconscious, it takes an extra 10 (3d6) psychic damage and is cursed until the hag dies or the curse is removed. The cursed creature's hit point maximum decreases by 5 (1d10) whenever it finishes a long rest.

reactions.name: Dream Eater
reactions.desc: When an unconscious creature the hag can see within 30 feet of her regains consciousness, the hag can force the creature to make a 15 Wisdom saving throw. Unless the save succeeds, the creature takes 11 (2d10) psychic damage, and the hag regains hit points equal to the amount of damage taken.

spells: The hag's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 15). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Dyrrn
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_resistances: poison, psychic
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, exhaustion, frightened, poisoned, prone

traits.name: Alien Mind
traits.desc: If a creature tries to read Dyrrn's thoughts or deals psychic damage to it, that creature must succeed on a 23 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Dyrrn fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Dyrrn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Dyrrn regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If Dyrrn takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Dyrrn dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Teleport
traits.desc: As a bonus action, Dyrrn can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Dyrrn makes one Tentacle Whip attack and uses its Corruption once. Dyrrn can replace its Tentacle Whip attack with Extract Brain if it has a creature grappled.

actions.name: Tentacle Whip
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 24 (3d10 + 8) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape 23), pulled into an unoccupied space within 5 feet of Dyrrn, and must succeed on a 23 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends. Dyrrn can't use the same tentacle whip on another target until this grapple ends. Dyrrn has two tentacle whips.

actions.name: Corruption
actions.desc:
Dyrrn targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 23 Constitution saving throw or take 22 (4d6 + 8) necrotic damage and become corrupted for 1 minute.
A corrupted creature's flesh twists in alien ways. The creature has disadvantage on attack rolls, its speed is reduced by half, and if it tries to cast a spell, it must first succeed on a 15 Intelligence check or the spell fails and is wasted. The corrupted creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Extract Brain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated creature grappled by Dyrrn. 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, Dyrrn kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

legendary_actions.name: Tentacle Whip
legendary_actions.desc: Dyrrn makes one attack with its Tentacle Whip.

legendary_actions.name: Spawn Aberration (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Dyrrn regurgitates an intellect devourer in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of it. The intellect devourer is under Dyrrn's control and acts immediately after Dyrrn in the initiative order.

legendary_actions.name: Mind Blast (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Dyrrn magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 23 Intelligence saving throw or take 30 (5d8 + 8) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monsters.name: Expeditious Messenger
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.languages: one language spoken by its creator

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The messenger doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Telepathic Bond
traits.desc: While the messenger is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Fastieth
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.name: Quickness (Recharge 5-6)
traits.desc: The fastieth can take the Dodge action as a bonus action.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Garra
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

monsters.name: Hashalaq Quori
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_resistances: psychic

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The quori uses its Mind Thrust twice.

actions.name: Idyllic Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) force damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 16 Wisdom saving throw or fall prone in a fit of laughter.

actions.name: Mind Thrust
actions.desc: The quori targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a 16 Wisdom saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Possession (Recharge 6)
actions.desc:
One humanoid that the quori can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 16 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the quori; the quori then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. The quori now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The quori can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.
The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the quori ends it as a bonus action, or the quori is forced out by an effect like the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the quori reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. The target is immune to this quori's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

reactions.name: Empathic Feedback
reactions.desc: When the quori takes damage from a creature it can see within 60 feet of it, the quori can force that creature to succeed on a 16 Intelligence saving throw or take 11 (2d10) psychic damage.

spells: The quori's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 16). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

monsters.name: Inspired
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_resistances: psychic

traits.name: Dual Mind
traits.desc: The Inspired has advantage on Wisdom saving throws.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Inspired makes two crysteel dagger attacks. It can replace one attack with vicious mockery.

actions.name: Crysteel Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) force damage.

actions.name: Vicious Mockery (Cantrip)
actions.desc: The Inspired unleashes a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments at one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can hear the Inspired, the target must succeed on a 13 Wisdom saving throw or take 2 (1d4) psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

spells: The Inspired's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.1/day each: charm person, dissonant whispers, hex, hold person, mage armor

monsters.name: Iron Defender
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.desc: The defender has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks.

traits.name: Telepathic Bond
traits.desc: While the defender is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or take an extra 3 (1d6) piercing damage and be grappled (escape 13). The defender can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

monsters.name: Kalaraq Quori
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, necrotic, poison, psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained

traits.name: All-Around Vision
traits.desc: The quori can't be {@status surprised} while it isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The quori can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The quori has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The quori makes two Soul Binding attacks. Alternatively, it can make four attacks with Arcane Blast.

actions.name: Arcane Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +13 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 12 (1d10 + 7) force damage.

actions.name: Soul Binding
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 29 (4d10 + 7) necrotic damage. A creature reduced to 0 hit points from this attack dies and has its soul imprisoned in one of the quori's eyes. The target can't be revived by any means short of a wish spell until the quori is destroyed.

actions.name: Mind Seed (1/Day)
actions.desc:
The quori touches one humanoid, which must succeed on a 21 Intelligence saving throw or be cursed. The curse lasts until it's removed by a remove curse or greater restoration spell.
The cursed target suffers 1 level of exhaustion every 24 hours, and finishing a long rest doesn't reduce its exhaustion. If the cursed target reaches exhaustion level 6, it doesn't die; it instead becomes a thrall under the quori's control, and all its exhaustion is removed. Only the wish spell can free the thrall from this control.

actions.name: Swarm of Eyes (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The quori creates a swarm of spectral eyes that fills a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in that area must make a 21 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 45 (10d8) psychic damage, and it is blinded for 1 minute. On a success, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't blinded. A blinded creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Possession (Recharge 6)
actions.desc:
One humanoid that the quori can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 21 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the quori; the quori then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. The quori now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The quori can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.
The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the quori ends it as a bonus action, or the quori is forced out by an effect like the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the quori reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. The target is immune to this quori's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

spells: The quori's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 21, +13 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

monsters.name: Kalashtar
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_resistances: psychic

traits.name: Dual Mind
traits.desc: The kalashtar has advantage on Wisdom saving throws.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Mind Thrust
actions.desc: The kalashtar targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 12 Wisdom saving throw or take 11 (2d10) psychic damage.

monsters.name: Karrnathi Undead Soldier
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, poison

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The soldier has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the soldier's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.desc: If damage reduces the soldier to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the soldier drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The soldier attacks three times with one of its weapons.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The soldier adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the soldier must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Lady Illmarrow
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_immunities: necrotic, poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, lightning
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, stunned

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Illmarrow fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Illmarrow has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.desc: Illmarrow's body turns to dust when she drops to 0 hit points, and her equipment is left behind. She gains a new body after 1d10 days, regaining all her hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within two hundred miles of the location at which she was destroyed.

actions.name: Chill Touch (Cantrip)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +15 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 18 (4d8) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of Illmarrow's next turn. If the target is undead, it also has disadvantage on attack rolls against Illmarrow until the end of her next turn.

actions.name: Paralyzing Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 13 (3d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a 20 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Poison Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc:
Illmarrow exhales poisonous gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 20 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 35 (10d6) poison damage and is poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the creature can't regain hit points. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't poisoned.
A humanoid reduced to 0 hit points by this damage dies and rises at the start of Illmarrow's next turn as a zombie. The zombie acts immediately after Illmarrow in the initiative count and is permanently under her command, following her verbal orders.

legendary_actions.name: Cantrip
legendary_actions.desc: Illmarrow casts a cantrip.

legendary_actions.name: Paralyzing Claw
legendary_actions.desc: Illmarrow uses her Paralyzing Claw.

legendary_actions.name: Frightening Presence (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Illmarrow targets up to three creatures she can see within 30 feet of her. Each target must succeed on a 20 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to Illmarrow's Frightening Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Poison Breath (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Illmarrow recharges her Poison Breath and uses it.

spells: Illmarrow is a 20th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 23, +15 to hit with spell attacks). Illmarrow has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): chill touch (see "Actions" below), fire bolt, mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost

spells.1st level (4 slots): magic missile, shield, sleep

spells.3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, counterspell, fireball, fly, lightning bolt

spells.5th level (3 slots): cloudkill, cone of cold, hold monster, scrying

spells.6th level (2 slots): chain lightning, circle of death, create undead

spells.7th level (2 slots): finger of death, forcecage, prismatic spray

monsters.name: Living Burning Hands
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, poisoned, prone

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The living spell can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Magical Strike
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) fire damage.

actions.name: Spell Mimicry (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The living spell unleashes a thin sheet of flames in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Living Cloudkill
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, poisoned, prone

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The living spell can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The living spell makes two Magical Strike attacks.

actions.name: Magical Strike
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (5d6 + 5) poison damage.

actions.name: Spell Mimicry (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc:
The living spell creates a 40-foot-diameter sphere of fog within 60 feet of it (the fog spreads around corners). When a creature enters the fog for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The fog moves 10 feet away from the living spell at the start of each of its turns, rolling along the ground and through openings. The fog lasts for 10 minutes or until the living spell's {@status concentration} ends (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell).

monsters.name: Living Lightning Bolt
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, poisoned, prone

traits.name: Amorphous
traits.desc: The living spell can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The living spell makes two Magical Strike attacks.

actions.name: Magical Strike
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (5d6 + 4) lightning damage.

actions.name: Spell Mimicry (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The living spell unleashes a stroke of lightning in a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Magewright
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

spells: The magewright's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 12). To cast one of its rituals, the magewright must provide additional material components whose value in gold pieces is 20 times the spell's level. These components are consumed when the ritual is finished. The magewright knows the following spells:

monsters.name: Mordakhesh
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Limited Magic Immunity
traits.desc: Mordakhesh can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless he wishes to be. Mordakhesh has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Mordakhesh makes three greatsword attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 5 (1d10) force damage.

actions.name: Chromatic Orb
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +10 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 13 (3d8) damage of a type chosen by Mordakhesh: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Mordakhesh makes one weapon attack or casts chromatic orb.

legendary_actions.name: Chromatic Resistance
legendary_actions.desc: Modakhesh gains resistance to one damage type of his choice—acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder—until the start of his next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Warlord's Command (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Mordakhesh targets up to two allies that he can see within 30 feet of him. If a target can see and hear him, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

spells: Mordakhesh's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). Mordakhesh can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: chromatic orb (see "Actions" below), detect thoughts, disguise self

spells.1/day each: banishing smite, destructive wave, fly, mass suggestion, staggering smite, suggestion, true seeing

monsters.name: Radiant Idol
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_resistances: radiant, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Aura of False Divinity
traits.desc: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the radiant idol must make a 17 Wisdom saving throw, provided the radiant idol isn't incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature is charmed by the radiant idol. A creature charmed in this way can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once it succeeds on the saving throw, a creature is immune to this radiant idol's Aura of False Divinity for 24 hours.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The radiant idol has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The radiant idol makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Flail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Radiant Strike (1/Day)
actions.desc: The radiant idol chooses a point on the ground it can see within 60 feet of it. A 30-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder of bright light appears there until the start of the radiant idol's next turn. Each creature in the cylinder when it appears or that ends its turn there must make a 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spells: The radiant idol's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 17). The radiant idol can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: charm person, cure wounds, disguise self, thaumaturgy

spells.1/day each: commune, dominate person, insect plague, mass suggestion, raise dead

monsters.name: Rak Tulkhesh
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, stunned

traits.name: Deadly Critical
traits.desc: Rak Tulkhesh scores a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 and rolls the damage dice three times, instead of twice.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Rak Tulkhesh fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Rak Tulkhesh has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Whirlwind of Weapons
traits.desc: A magical aura of weapons surrounds Rak Tulkhesh in a 10 foot radius. At the start of each of his turns, any other creature in the aura takes 14 (4d6) force damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Rak Tulkhesh makes four weapon attacks.

actions.name: Spawned Melee Weapon
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 28 (3d12 + 9) force damage.

actions.name: Spawned Ranged Weapon
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +12 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 17 (3d8 + 4) force damage.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc:
Rak Tulkhesh magically polymorphs into a humanoid, beast, or giant that has a challenge rating no higher than his own, or back into his true form. He reverts to his true form if he dies. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (his choice).
In a new form, Rak Tulkhesh retains his alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. His statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Rak Tulkhesh makes one weapon attack.

legendary_actions.name: End Magic (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Rak Tulkhesh casts dispel magic.

legendary_actions.name: Provoke Rage (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Each creature within 60 feet of Rak Tulkhesh must succeed on a 24 Wisdom saving throw or use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack against a random creature within reach. If no creatures are within reach, it makes a ranged weapon attack against a random creature within range, throwing its weapon if necessary. This attack is made with advantage and gains a +4 bonus to the damage roll.

spells: Rak Tulkhesh's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 24). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: detect thoughts, dispel magic, spirit guardians

spells.1/day each: banishing smite, blinding smite, staggering smite

monsters.name: Sergeant
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

monsters.name: Shifter
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.name: Shifting (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the shifter takes on a more bestial form for 1 minute or until it dies. The shifter gains 5 temporary hit points. It can make a bite attack when it activates this trait and also as a bonus action on each of its turns while in its bestial form.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Sul Khatesh
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_immunities: poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Sul Khatesh fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Sul Khatesh has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Master of Magic
traits.desc: Sul Khatesh has advantage on Constitution saving throws to maintain {@status concentration}.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Sul Khatesh makes four attacks with Arcane Blast.

actions.name: Arcane Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +18 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 15 (1d10 + 10) force damage.

actions.name: Magic Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 36 (5d12 + 4) force damage.

actions.name: Arcane Cataclysm (Recharges after a Long Rest)
actions.desc: Sul Khatesh conjures orbs of magical energy that plummet to the ground at three different points she can see within 1 mile of her. Each creature in a 40-foot-radius sphere centered on each point must make a 26 Dexterity saving throw, taking 71 (11d12) force damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature in the area of more than one arcane burst is affected only once. The area of each arcane burst then acts as an antimagic field for 1 hour. Sul Khatesh and spells she casts are unaffected by these fields.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc:
Sul Khatesh magically polymorphs into a humanoid, beast, or giant that has a challenge rating no higher than her own, or back into her true form. She reverts to her true form if she dies. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (Sul Khatesh's choice).
In a new form, Sul Khatesh retains her alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Her statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Sul Khatesh makes two attacks with her Arcane Blast or one attack with her magic staff.

legendary_actions.name: Consume Magic (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Sul Khatesh targets a creature within 120 feet of her who is {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell. The target must succeed on a 26 Constitution saving throw or its {@status concentration} is broken on the spell, and Sul Khatesh gains 5 temporary hit points per level of that spell.

legendary_actions.name: Maddening Secrets (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Sul Khatesh whispers an arcane secret into the mind of a creature she can see within 60 feet of her. The target must succeed on a 26 Wisdom saving throw or expend one of its spell slots of 3rd level or lower and deal 26 (4d12) force damage to each creature within 30 feet of it. A creature that fails the saving throw but can't expend a spell slot is instead stunned until the end of its next turn.

spells: Sul Khatesh's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 26, +18 to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: counterspell, detect magic, detect thoughts, dispel magic, eyebite, fireball, lightning bolt, shield

spells.3/day each: chain lightning, create undead, dream, hold monster, mass suggestion, scrying

spells.1/day each: foresight, gate, power word kill, teleport

monsters.name: Tarkanan Assassin
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.alignment: lawful neutral (law/chaos axis) chaotic neutral (good/evil axis) evil

traits.name: Unstable Mark
traits.desc: When the assassin casts an innate spell, each creature within 10 feet of the assassin must make a 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The assassin makes two shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +4 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 11 (2d10) fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

actions.name: Chromatic Orb (1/Day)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +4 to hit, range 90 ft., one creature. 18 (4d8) damage of a type chosen by the assassin: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder.

spells: The assassin's spellcasting ability is Constitution (+4 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: The Lord of Blades
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, poison

traits.name: Adamantine Plating
traits.desc: Any critical hit against the Lord of Blades becomes a normal hit.

traits.name: Bladed Armor
traits.desc: A creature that grapples the Lord of Blades or is grappled by him takes 13 (3d8) slashing damage. A creature takes 13 (3d8) slashing damage if it starts its turn grappling or being grappled by the Lord of Blades.

traits.name: Charge
traits.desc: If the Lord of Blades moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with his adamantine sixblade on the same turn, the target takes an extra 11 (2d10) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 19 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.

traits.name: Warforged Resilience
traits.desc: The Lord of Blades has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned, is immune to disease, and magic can't put him to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Lord of Blades makes three attacks: two with his adamantine sixblade and one with his bladed wings.

actions.name: Adamantine Sixblade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 21 (3d10 + 5) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) force damage.

actions.name: Bladed Wings
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +10 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 22 (4d10) fire damage.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The Lord of Blades makes one weapon attack.

legendary_actions.name: Cantrip
legendary_actions.desc: The Lord of Blades casts one of his cantrips.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The Lord of Blades casts a spell of 2nd level or lower from his spell list that takes 1 action to cast.

legendary_actions.name: Blade Dash (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The Lord of Blades moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks, then makes one attack with his adamantine sixblade. He can make one bladed wings attack against each creature he moves past.

spells: The Lord of Blades is a 20th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following artificer spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt (see "Actions" below), mage hand, mending, prestidigitation

spells.1st level (4 slots): expeditious retreat, sanctuary, thunderwave

spells.2nd level (3 slots): blur, heat metal, scorching ray, see invisibility

spells.4th level (3 slots): freedom of movement, Mordenkainen's faithful hound

monsters.name: Tsucora Quori
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_resistances: psychic

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The quori makes three attacks: one pincer attack, one attack with its claws, and one stinger attack.

actions.name: Pincer
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage. The target is grappled (escape 14) if it is a Large or smaller creature. The quori has two pincers, each of which can grapple one target.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (4d4 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Stinger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the quori for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Possession (Recharge 6)
actions.desc:
One humanoid that the quori can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a 14 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the quori; the quori then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. The quori now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The quori can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.
The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the quori ends it as a bonus action, or the quori is forced out by an effect like the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the quori reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. The target is immune to this quori's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

spells: The quori's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

monsters.name: Undying Councilor
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.name: Aura of Radiance
traits.desc: The councilor magically sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. The councilor can extinguish or restore this light as a bonus action. If the bright light overlaps with an area of darkness created by a spell of 3rd level or lower, the spell that created that darkness is dispelled.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The councilor has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The councilor makes two Radiant Touch attacks.

actions.name: Radiant Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5) radiant damage.

actions.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
actions.desc: The councilor touches another creature. The target magically regains 18 (3d8 + 5) hit points and is freed from one curse afflicting it (councilor's choice).

actions.name: Flame Strike (5th-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
actions.desc: The councilor chooses a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on that point must make a 17 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 14 (4d6) fire damage and 14 (4d6) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the councilor casts this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the fire damage or the radiant damage (its choice) increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 5th.

legendary_actions.name: Touch
legendary_actions.desc: The councilor makes one attack with its Radiant Touch.

legendary_actions.name: Shimmering Aura (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The councilor channels positive energy into its Aura of Radiance. Until the end of the councilor's next turn, it sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet. Any creature that starts its turn in the bright light must succeed on a 17 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of the councilor's next turn.

spells: The councilor is a 13th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): guidance, mending, sacred flame, spare the dying, thaumaturgy

spells.1st level (4 slots): bless, command, create or destroy water

spells.5th level (2 slots): dispel evil and good, flame strike (see "Actions" below), scrying

monsters.name: Undying Soldier
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_resistances: radiant, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The soldier magically sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. The soldier can extinguish or restore this light as a bonus action.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.desc: The soldier has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The soldier makes two spear attacks.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 9 (2d8) radiant damage if the target is a fiend or undead.

monsters.name: Valenar Hawk
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.languages: understands Common, Elvish, and Sylvan but can't speak

traits.name: Bonding
traits.desc: The hawk can magically bond with one creature it can see, immediately after spending at least 1 hour observing that creature while within 30 feet of it. The bond lasts until the hawk bonds with a different creature or until the bonded creature dies. While bonded, the hawk and the bonded creature can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 100 feet.

traits.name: Keen Sight
traits.desc: The hawk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Valenar Hound
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.languages: understands Common, Elvish, and Sylvan but can't speak

traits.name: Bonding
traits.desc: The hound can magically bond with one creature it can see, immediately after spending at least 1 hour observing that creature while within 30 feet of it. The bond lasts until the hound bonds with a different creature or until the bonded creature dies. While bonded, the hound and the bonded creature can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 100 feet.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.desc: The hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

monsters.name: Valenar Steed
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.languages: understands Common, Elvish, and Sylvan but can't speak

traits.name: Bonding
traits.desc: The steed can magically bond with one creature it can see, immediately after spending at least 1 hour observing that creature while within 30 feet of it. The bond lasts until the steed bonds with a different creature or until the bonded creature dies. While bonded, the steed and the bonded creature can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 100 feet.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Warforged Colossus
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_immunities: necrotic, poison, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, stunned

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The colossus is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the colossus fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The colossus has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The colossus deals double damage to objects and structures.

traits.name: Towering Terror
traits.desc: Any enemy outside the colossus that starts its turn within 30 feet of it must succeed on a 26 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the start of the enemy's next turn. If the enemy's saving throw is successful, it is immune to this colossus's Towering Terror for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The colossus makes three attacks—one with its slam and two with its eldritch turrets—and then uses Stomp.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 29 (3d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and the colossus can push the target up to 20 feet away from it.

actions.name: Eldritch Turret
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +18 to hit, range 300 ft., one target. 18 (4d8) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it is knocked prone.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.desc:
The colossus stomps one of its feet at a point on the ground within 20 feet of it. Any creature in a 20-foot-radius, 20-foot-high cylinder centered on this point must succeed on a 26 Dexterity saving throw or take 33 (6d10) bludgeoning damage and fall prone. Until the colossus uses its Stomp again or moves, the creature is restrained. While restrained in this way, the creature (or another creature within 5 feet of it) can use its action to make a 26 Strength check. On a success, the creature relocates to an unoccupied space of its choice within 5 feet of the colossus and is no longer restrained.
Structures, as well as nonmagical objects that are neither being worn nor carried, take the same amount of damage if they are in the cylinder (no save).

actions.name: Incinerating Beam (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The colossus fires a beam of light in a 150-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a 26 Dexterity saving throw, taking 60 (11d10) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this beam is disintegrated, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

monsters.name: Warforged Soldier
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_resistances: poison

traits.name: Warforged Resilience
traits.desc: The warforged has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned and is immune to disease. Magic can't put it to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The warforged makes two armblade attacks.

actions.name: Armblade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Protection
reactions.desc: When an attacker the warforged can see makes an attack roll against a creature within 5 feet of the warforged, the warforged can impose disadvantage on the attack roll.

monsters.name: Warforged Titan
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
monsters.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Platforms
traits.desc: The warforged titan has two platforms built into its chassis. One Medium or smaller creature can ride on each platform without squeezing. To make a melee attack against a target within 5 feet of the warforged, they must use spears or weapons with reach and the target must be Large or larger.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The warforged titan deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The warforged titan makes one axehand attack and one hammerfist attack.

actions.name: Axehand
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6) slashing damage, plus 11 (2d10) slashing damage if the target is prone.

actions.name: Hammerfist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Sweeping Axe (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The warforged titan makes a sweep with its axehand, and each creature within 10 feet of it must make a 17 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 19 (3d8 + 6) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Zakya Rakshasa
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Limited Magic Immunity
traits.desc: The rakshasa can't be affected or detected by spells of 1st level or lower unless it wishes to be. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The rakshasa's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Martial Prowess (1/Turn)
traits.desc: When the rakshasa hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 11 (2d10) damage of the weapon's type, and the creature must make a 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, the rakshasa can push the creature up to 10 feet away from it, knock the creature prone, or make the creature drop one item it is holding of the rakshasa's choice.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The rakshasa makes three melee weapon attacks. Alternatively, it can make two ranged attacks with its javelins.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

spells: The rakshasa's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 11). The rakshasa can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Avatar of Death
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, unconscious
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., truesight 60 ft., passive Perception 13
monsters.languages: all languages known to its summoner

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The avatar can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Turn Immunity
traits.desc: The avatar is immune to features that turn undead.

actions.name: Reaping Scythe
actions.desc: The avatar sweeps its spectral scythe through a creature within 5 feet of it, dealing 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.

monsters.name: Larva
monsters.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 (1d4 - 1) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Aarakocra
source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
Critical Role: Call of the Netherdeep

traits.name: Dive Attack
traits.desc: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 3 (1d6) damage to the target.

actions.name: Talon
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Summon Air Elemental
actions.desc: Five aarakocra within 30 feet of each other can magically summon an air elemental. Each of the five must use its action and movement on three consecutive turns to perform an aerial dance and must maintain {@status concentration} while doing so (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell). When all five have finished their third turn of the dance, the elemental appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of them. It is friendly toward them and obeys their spoken commands. It remains for 1 hour, until it or all its summoners die, or until any of its summoners dismisses it as a bonus action. A summoner can't perform the dance again until it finishes a short rest. When the elemental returns to the Elemental Plane of Air, any aarakocra within 5 feet of it can return with it.

monsters.name: Aboleth
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Mucous Cloud
traits.desc: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by transformative mucus. A creature that touches the aboleth or that hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it must make a 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is diseased for 1d4 hours. The diseased creature can breathe only underwater.

traits.name: Probing Telepathy
traits.desc: If a creature communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires if the aboleth can see the creature.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The aboleth makes three tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or become diseased. The disease has no effect for 1 minute and can be removed by any magic that cures disease. After 1 minute, the diseased creature's skin becomes translucent and slimy, the creature can't regain hit points unless it is underwater, and the disease can be removed only by heal or another disease-curing spell of 6th level or higher. When the creature is outside a body of water, it takes 6 (1d12) acid damage every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to the skin before 10 minutes have passed.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Enslave (3/Day)
actions.desc:
The aboleth targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed by the aboleth until the aboleth dies or until it is on a different plane of existence from the target. The charmed target is under the aboleth's control and can't take reactions, and the aboleth and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance.
Whenever the charmed target takes damage, the target can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends. No more than once every 24 hours, the target can also repeat the saving throw when it is at least 1 mile away from the aboleth.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.desc: The aboleth makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Swipe
legendary_actions.desc: The aboleth makes one tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Psychic Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: One creature charmed by the aboleth takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage, and the aboleth regains hit points equal to the damage the creature takes.

monsters.name: Abominable Yeti
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.name: Fear of Fire
traits.desc: If the yeti takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The yeti has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Snow Camouflage
traits.desc: The yeti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Chilling Gaze
actions.desc: The yeti targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the yeti, the target must succeed on a 18 Constitution saving throw against this magic or take 21 (6d6) cold damage and then be paralyzed for 1 minute, unless it is immune to cold damage. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends on it, the target is immune to this yeti's gaze for 1 hour.

actions.name: Cold Breath (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The yeti exhales a 30-foot cone of frigid air. Each creature in that area must make a 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monsters.name: Acolyte
source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War
Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
Critical Role: Call of the Netherdeep

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

spells: The acolyte is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The acolyte has following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy

monsters.name: Adult Black Dragon
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 21

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) acid damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a 16 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales acid in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 (12d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a 19 Dexterity saving throw or take 13 (2d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

monsters.name: Adult Blue Dracolich
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 24

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the dracolich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The dracolich has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dracolich can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (2d10 + 7) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) lightning damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 16 (2d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence

If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dracolich's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dracolich exhales lightning in a 90-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 (12d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.desc: The dracolich makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The dracolich makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The dracolich beats its tattered wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dracolich must succeed on a 21 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 (2d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. After beating its wings this way, the dracolich can fly up to half its flying speed.

actions.desc:
The dragon magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the dragon's choice).

Its statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

traits.name: Air Form
traits.desc: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

actions.desc: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Whirlwind (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc:
Each creature in the elemental's space must make a 13 Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 15 (3d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage and is flung up 20 feet away from the elemental in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes an object, such as a wall or floor, the target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a 13 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone.
If the saving throw is successful, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't flung away or knocked prone.

traits.desc: If the allosaurus moves at least 30 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the allosaurus can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc:
The dragon magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the dragon's choice).
In a new form, the dragon retains its alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Its statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

monsters.name: Androsphinx
monsters.damage_immunities: psychic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Inscrutable
traits.desc: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The sphinx's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sphinx makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (2d10 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Roar (3/Day)
actions.desc: The sphinx emits a magical roar. Each time it roars before finishing a long rest, the roar is louder and the effect is different, as detailed below. Each creature within 500 feet of the sphinx and able to hear the roar must make a saving throw.

actions.name: First Roar
actions.desc: Each creature that fails a 18 Wisdom saving throw is frightened for 1 minute. A frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Second Roar
actions.desc: Each creature that fails a 18 Wisdom saving throw is deafened and frightened for 1 minute. A frightened creature is paralyzed and can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Third Roar
actions.desc: Each creature makes a 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 44 (8d10) thunder damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone.

legendary_actions.name: Claw Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The sphinx makes one claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The sphinx casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

spells: The sphinx is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). It requires no material components to cast its spells. The sphinx has the following cleric spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): sacred flame, spare the dying, thaumaturgy

spells.1st level (4 slots): command, detect evil and good, detect magic

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the armor remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal suit of armor.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Slam

Until this grapple ends, the ankheg can bite only the grappled creature and has advantage on attack rolls to do so.

actions.name: Acid Spray (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The ankheg spits acid in a line that is 30 feet long and 5 feet wide, provided that it has no creature grappled. Each creature in that line must make a 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Critical Role: Call of the Netherdeep
monsters.alignment: lawful neutral (law/chaos axis) chaotic neutral (good/evil axis) evil
