actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape 13).

monsters.name: Vampire Spellcaster
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc:
If the vampire isn't in sunlight or running water, it can use its action to polymorph into a Tiny bat or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into its true form.
While in bat form, the vampire can't speak, its walking speed is 5 feet, and it has a flying speed of 30 feet. Its statistics, other than its size and speed, are unchanged. Anything it is wearing transforms with it, but nothing it is carrying does. It reverts to its true form if it dies.
While in mist form, the vampire can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. It is weightless, has a flying speed of 20 feet, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can't pass through water. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the vampire fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Misty Escape
traits.desc:
When it drops to 0 hit points outside its resting place, the vampire transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling unconscious, provided that it isn't in sunlight or running water. If it can't transform, it is destroyed.
While it has 0 hit points in mist form, it can't revert to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it reverts to its vampire form. It is then paralyzed until it regains at least 1 hit point. After spending 1 hour in its resting place with 0 hit points, it regains 1 hit point.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The vampire regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Vampire Weaknesses
traits.desc:
The vampire has the following flaws:
{@i Forbiddance.} The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.
{@i Harmed by Running Water.} The vampire takes 20 acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.
{@i Stake to the Heart.} If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire is incapacitated in its resting place, the vampire is paralyzed until the stake is removed.
{@i Sunlight Hypersensitivity.} The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

actions.name: Multiattack (Vampire Form Only)
actions.desc: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike (Vampire Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape 18).

actions.name: Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a vampire spawn under the vampire's control.

actions.name: Charm
actions.desc:
The vampire targets one humanoid it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the vampire, the target must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be charmed by the vampire. The charmed target regards the vampire as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the vampire's control, it takes the vampire's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can, and it is a willing target for the vampire's bite attack.
Each time the vampire or the vampire's companions do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the vampire is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, or takes a bonus action to end the effect.

actions.name: Children of the Night (1/Day)
actions.desc: The vampire magically calls 2d4 swarms of swarm of bats rounds, acting as allies of the vampire and obeying its spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until the vampire dies, or until the vampire dismisses them as a bonus action.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: The vampire moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Unarmed Strike
legendary_actions.desc: The vampire makes one unarmed strike.

legendary_actions.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The vampire makes one bite attack.

spells: The vampire is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). The vampire has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost

spells.1st level (4 slots): comprehend languages, fog cloud, sleep

spells.2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, gust of wind, mirror image

monsters.name: Vine Blight
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the blight remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a tangle of vines.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and a Large or smaller target is grappled (escape 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the blight can't constrict another target.

actions.name: Entangling Plants (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Grasping roots and vines sprout in a 15-foot radius centered on the blight, withering away after 1 minute. For the duration, that area is difficult terrain for nonplant creatures. In addition, each creature of the blight's choice in that area when the plants appear must succeed on a 12 Strength saving throw or become restrained. A creature can use its action to make a 12 Strength check, freeing itself or another entangled creature within reach on a success.

monsters.senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 6

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While the violet fungus remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.

actions.desc: The fungus makes 1d4 Rotting Touch attacks.

actions.name: Rotting Touch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.

Critical Role: Call of the Netherdeep
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The vrock has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The vrock makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d10 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spores (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: A 15-foot-radius cloud of toxic spores extends out from the vrock. The spores spread around corners. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned. While poisoned in this way, a target takes 5 (1d10) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Emptying a vial of holy water on the target also ends the effect on it.

actions.name: Stunning Screech (1/Day)
actions.desc: The vrock emits a horrific screech. Each creature within 20 feet of it that can hear it and that isn't a demon must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the vrock's next turn.

traits.name: Keen Sight and Smell
traits.desc: The vulture has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The vulture has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Warhorse
source: Critical Role: Call of the Netherdeep

traits.name: Trampling Charge
traits.desc: If the horse moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a hooves attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the horse can make another attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Water Elemental
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Water Form
traits.desc: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Freeze
traits.desc: If the elemental takes cold damage, it partially freezes; its speed is reduced by 20 feet until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Whelm (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc:
Each creature in the elemental's space must make a 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If it is Large or smaller, it is also grappled (escape 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. If the saving throw is successful, the target is pushed out of the elemental's space.
The elemental can grapple one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures at one time. At the start of each of the elemental's turns, each target grappled by it takes 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. A creature within 5 feet of the elemental can pull a creature or object out of it by taking an action to make a 14 Strength check and succeeding.

monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, poisoned, restrained, prone, unconscious

traits.name: Water Bound
traits.desc: The water weird dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound or if that water is destroyed.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 13 (3d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape 13) and pulled 5 feet toward the water weird. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, the water weird tries to drown it, and the water weird can't constrict another target.

monsters.name: Wight
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the wight has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The wight makes two longsword attacks or two longbow attacks. It can use its Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d6 + 2) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.
A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie under the wight's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The wight can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.

actions.name: Longsword

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

monsters.name: Will-o'-Wisp
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
Critical Role: Call of the Netherdeep
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold, fire, necrotic, thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Consume Life
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the will-o'-wisp can target one creature it can see within 5 feet of it that has 0 hit points and is still alive. The target must succeed on a 10 Constitution saving throw against this magic or die. If the target dies, the will-o'-wisp regains 10 (3d6) hit points.

traits.name: Ephemeral
traits.desc: The will-o'-wisp can't wear or carry anything.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The will-o'-wisp can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Variable Illumination
traits.desc: The will-o'-wisp sheds bright light in a 5 to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of ft. equal to the chosen radius. The will-o'-wisp can alter the radius as a bonus action.

actions.name: Shock
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.desc: The will-o'-wisp and its light magically become invisible until it attacks or uses its Consume Life, or until its {@status concentration} ends (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell).

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dropped Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, one target directly below the kobold. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

The target must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

actions.name: Create Specter
actions.desc: The wraith targets a humanoid within 10 feet of it that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute and died violently. The target's spirit rises as a specter in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space. The specter is under the wraith's control. The wraith can have no more than seven specters under its control at one time.

actions.name: Chilling Gaze
actions.desc: The yeti targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the yeti, the target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw against this magic or take 10 (3d6) cold damage and then be paralyzed for 1 minute, unless it is immune to cold damage. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends on it, the target is immune to the Chilling Gaze of all yetis (but not abominable yetis) for 1 hour.

monsters.name: Yochlol
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
Critical Role: Call of the Netherdeep
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The yochlol can use its action to polymorph into a form that resembles a female drow or giant spider, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The yochlol has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The yochlol can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.desc: The yochlol ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The yochlol makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Slam (Bite in Spider Form)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. (10 feet in demon form), one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning (piercing in spider form) damage plus 21 (6d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Mist Form
actions.desc:
The yochlol transforms into toxic mist or reverts to its true form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is also transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.
While in mist form, the yochlol is incapacitated and can't speak. It has a flying speed of 30 feet, can hover, and can pass through any space that isn't airtight. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to nonmagical damage.
While in mist form, the yochlol can enter a creature's space and stop there. Each time that creature starts its turn with the yochlol in its space, the creature must succeed on a 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of its next turn. While poisoned in this way, the target is incapacitated.

spells: The yochlol's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 14). The yochlol can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells: The yuan-ti's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 13). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Yuan-ti Malison (Type 3)

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.desc: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Medium snake, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Malison Type
traits.desc: The yuan-ti has one of the following types:

traits.name: Type 1:
traits.desc: Human body with snake head

traits.name: Type 2:
traits.desc: Human head and body with snakes for arms

traits.name: Type 3:
traits.desc: Human head and upper body with a serpentine lower body instead of legs

actions.name: Multiattack (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.desc: The yuan-ti makes two ranged attacks or two melee attacks, but can constrict only once.

actions.name: Bite (Snake Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the yuan-ti can't constrict another target.

actions.name: Scimitar (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow (Yuan-ti Form Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: The yuan-ti's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 13). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Yuan-ti Pureblood
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The yuan-ti makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

spells: The yuan-ti's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 12). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Zombie
source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage
Eberron: Rising from the Last War
The Lost Dungeon of Rickedness: Big Rick Energy
monsters.languages: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.desc: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

spells.1/day each: detect evil and good, bless, cure wounds, hold person, inflict wounds, spiritual weapon

traits.name: Spellcasting.
traits.desc: The cleric's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks).

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit 1d6+1 bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Turn Undead (1/rest)
actions.desc: Each undead that can see or hear the cleric and is within 30 feet must make a Wisdom saving throw. If the creature fails its saving throw, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. A turned creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from the cleric as it can, and it can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of them. It can't take reactions and for its action, it can use only the Dash action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. If there's nowhere to move, the creature can use the Dodge action.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.desc: The rogue deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the rogue that isn't incapacitated and the rogue doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Hand Crossbow
bonus_actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: When the rogue is subjected to an effect that allows the rogue to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the rogue instead take no damage if they succeed on the saving throw, and only half damage if they fail.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.desc: The rogue deals an extra 17 (5d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the rogue that isn't incapacitated and the rogue doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Attack
actions.desc: The rogue makes one shortsword or hand crossbow attack and adds its poison, if available.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Poison (Recharge 4-6)
actions.desc: When a creature is hit with the rogue's shortsword or hand crossbow, they must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) poison damage a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus_actions.name: Cunning Action
bonus_actions.desc: On each of its turns, the rogue can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

reactions.name: Uncanny Dodge
reactions.desc: When an attacker the rogue can see hits them with an attack, the rogue can use their reaction to halve the attacks damage.

monsters.name: Artificer (Tier 1)
spells: The artificer is a 3rd level spellcaster, its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks).

spells.1/day each: absorb elements, cure wounds, faerie fire

traits.name: Tool Proficiency
traits.desc: The artificer is proficient with Thieves' Tools, Tinker's Tools, and any one type of artisan's tools.

actions.name: Repeating Acid Slinger
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, 20/60 ft., one creature. Hit 10 (2d6 + 3) acid damage.

actions.name: Bomb (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The artificer launches a small bomb to a point within 30 feet of it. Each creature within a 5 foot radius of that point must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

reactions.name: Mind Sharpener Armor (3/day)
reactions.desc: When the artificer fails a Constitution saving throw to maintain concentration on a spell, they can use their reaction to succeed instead.

monsters.name: Niho Koi

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The oni regains 4 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The oni makes two attacks, with both its katanas.

actions.name: Kage no Yaiba (Blade of Shadows)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Katana
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.desc: The oni magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium humanoid, into a Large giant, or back into its true form. Other than its size, its statistics are the same in each form. The only equipment that is transformed is its katanas, which shrinks so that it can be wielded in humanoid form. If the oni dies, it reverts to its true form, and its glaive reverts to its normal size.

spells: The oni's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 13). The oni can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the anarch can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature it can see.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: The anarch deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Spiked Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands.

monsters.name: Archon of the Triumvirate
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Eye of the Law
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the archon can target a creature it can see within 120 feet of it and determine which laws that creature has broken in the last 24 hours.

traits.name: Mount
traits.desc: If the archon isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto the creature serving as its mount, provided the archon and its mount are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the archon appears astride the mount along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying. While mounted and not incapacitated, the archon can't be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}, and both it and its mount gain advantage on Dexterity saving throws. If the archon is reduced to 0 hit points while riding its mount, the mount is reduced to 0 hit points as well.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The archon makes two Hammer of Justice attacks.

actions.name: Hammer of Justice
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) force damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Pacifying Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the archon's choice that the archon can see within 120 feet of it must succeed on a 18 Wisdom saving throw, or else the target drops any weapons it is holding, ends its {@status concentration} on any spells or other effects, and becomes charmed by the archon for 1 minute. The charmed creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the archon's Pacifying Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Rejoin Mount
legendary_actions.desc: If the archon isn't mounted, it magically teleports to its steed and mounts it as long as the archon and its steed are on the same plane of existence.

legendary_actions.name: Smite (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The archon makes a Hammer of Justice attack, and then its mount can use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack.

legendary_actions.name: Detention (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The archon targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a 18 Charisma saving throw or be magically teleported to a harmless demiplane until the end of the archon's next turn, whereupon the target reappears in the space it left or the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

spells: The archon's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). The archon can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Arclight Phoenix
monsters.damage_resistances: thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The arclight phoenix doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Grounded Lightning
traits.desc: The first time on a turn that the arclight phoenix touches the ground, it takes 11 (2d10) force damage.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The arclight phoenix sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet.

traits.name: Lightning Form
traits.desc: The arclight phoenix can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the phoenix or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 9 (2d8) lightning damage. In addition, the arclight phoenix can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

traits.name: Crackling Death
traits.desc: When the arclight phoenix dies, it explodes. Each creature within 30 feet of it must make a 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion destroys the phoenix but leaves behind a Tiny, warm egg with a mizzium shell. The egg contains the embryo of a new arclight phoenix. It hatches when it is in the area of a spell that deals lightning damage, or if a creature touches the egg and expends spell slots whose combined levels equal 13 or more. When it hatches, the egg releases a new arclight phoenix that appears in the egg's space.

actions.name: Arclight Touch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 27 (6d8) lightning damage, and lightning jumps from the target to one creature of the phoenix's choice that it can see within 30 feet of the target. That second creature must succeed on a 18 Dexterity saving throw or take 27 (6d8) lightning damage.

monsters.name: Aurelia
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, radiant, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Aurelia fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Aurelia has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Aurelia makes three longsword attacks and uses Leadership.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (1d8 + 8) slashing damage, or 13 (1d10 + 8) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 27 (6d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Leadership
actions.desc: Aurelia utters a few inspiring words to one creature she can see within 30 feet of her. If the creature can hear her, it can add a d10 to one attack roll or saving throw it makes before the start of Aurelia's next turn.

actions.name: Warleader's Helix (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack +17 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. 54 (12d8) radiant damage, and Aurelia can choose another creature she can see within 10 feet of the target. The second creature regains 27 (6d8) hit points.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: Aurelia adds 7 to her AC against one melee attack that would hit her. To do so, Aurelia must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

reactions.name: Unyielding
reactions.desc: When Aurelia is subjected to an effect that would move her, knock her prone, or both, she can use her reaction to be neither moved nor knocked prone.

legendary_actions.name: Command Allies
legendary_actions.desc: Aurelia chooses up to three creatures she can see within 30 feet of her. If a chosen creature can see or hear Aurelia, it can immediately use its reaction to make one weapon attack, with advantage on the attack roll.

legendary_actions.name: Longsword Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Aurelia makes one longsword attack.

legendary_actions.name: Frighten Foes (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Aurelia targets up to five creatures she can see within 30 feet of her. Each target must succeed on a 25 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of her until the end of her next turn. Any target within 5 feet of Aurelia has disadvantage on the saving throw.

monsters.name: Battleforce Angel
monsters.damage_resistances: fire, radiant
monsters.senses: darkvision 120 ft., truesight 120 ft., passive Perception 16

traits.name: Flyby
traits.desc: The angel doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The angel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The angel makes two melee attacks. It also uses Battlefield Inspiration.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage. If the target is within 5 feet of any of the angel's allies, the target takes an extra 2 (1d4) radiant damage.

actions.name: Battlefield Inspiration
actions.desc: The angel chooses up to three creatures it can see within 30 feet of it. Until the end of the angel's next turn, each target can add a d4 to its attack rolls and saving throws.

monsters.name: Biomancer

traits.name: Bolstering Presence
traits.desc: The biomancer magically emanates life-giving energy within 30 feet of itself. Any ally of the biomancer that starts its turn there regains 5 (1d10) hit points.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The biomancer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

spells: The biomancer is a 16th-level Simic spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The biomancer has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): acid splash, light, mending, poison spray, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, grease, shield

spells.2nd level (3 slots): alter self, darkvision, enlarge/reduce, hold person

spells.3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, dispel magic, haste, protection from energy

spells.5th level (2 slots): cone of cold, creation, hold monster

monsters.name: Blistercoil Weird
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Feed on Fire
traits.desc: If the weird takes fire damage from a spell or other magical effect, its size increases by one category. If there isn't enough room for the weird to increase in size, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available. While the weird is Large or bigger, it makes Strength checks and saving throws with advantage. If the weird starts its turn at Gargantuan size, the weird releases energy in an explosion. Each creature within 30 feet of the weird must make a 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried. The weird's size then becomes Medium.

traits.name: Form of Fire and Water
traits.desc: The weird can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. In addition, the weird can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time the weird enters another creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the burning creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

traits.name: Heated Body
traits.desc: A creature that touches the weird or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The weird sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage, or 11 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage if the weird is Large or bigger.

monsters.name: Blood Drinker Vampire
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The vampire makes three melee attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. If the target is humanoid, it must succeed on a 15 Charisma saving throw or be charmed by the vampire for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, the target is infatuated with the vampire. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. The vampire can also grapple the target (escape 14) if it is a creature and the vampire has a hand free.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.desc: The vampire adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the vampire must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monsters.name: Blood Witch
monsters.damage_resistances: psychic
monsters.languages: Abyssal plus any one language (usually Common)

traits.name: Blood Witch Dance
traits.desc: The witch can use a bonus action to control the movement of one creature cursed by its hex spell that it can see within 30 feet of it. The creature must succeed on a 15 Charisma saving throw or use its reaction to move up to 30 feet in a direction of the witch's choice.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the witch's darkvision.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The witch makes two attacks: one with its longsword and one with its shortsword.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

spells: The witch's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The witch can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: alter self, detect magic, eldritch blast (at 11th level), false life, levitate (self only), mage armor (self only)

spells.3/day each: hellish rebuke, hex, scorching ray (at 3rd level)

actions.name: Chain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape 17). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the giant can't use this attack on anyone else.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Furious Defense
reactions.desc: After a creature the giant can see is dealt damage by a foe within 20 feet of the giant, the giant makes a chain attack against that foe.

monsters.name: Borborygmos
monsters.damage_resistances: poison, psychic

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Borborygmos fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Poor Depth Perception
traits.desc: Borborygmos has disadvantage on any attack roll against a target more than 30 feet away.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.desc: Borborygmos deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Borborygmos can use his Frightful Presence. He also makes two attacks: one with his maul and one with his stomp.

actions.name: Maul
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 28 (6d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 21 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 18 (2d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +13 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of Borborygmos's choice that is within 60 feet of him and can see or hear him must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of him for 1 minute. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Borborygmos's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Borborygmos makes a weapon attack.

legendary_actions.name: Bellow (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Borborygmos yells menacingly at one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. That creature must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of him for 1 minute. If the creature is already frightened, it becomes stunned instead. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Borborygmos's Bellow for the next 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Wide Berth (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Borborygmos moves up to half his speed and can move through the space of any creature smaller than Huge. The first time Borborygmos enters a creature's space during this move, the creature must make a 21 Dexterity saving throw. If the saving throw succeeds, the creature is pushed 5 feet away from Borborygmos. If the saving throw fails, that creature is knocked prone, and Borborygmos can make a stomp attack against it.

monsters.name: Cackler
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Last Laugh
traits.desc: When the cackler dies, it releases a dying laugh that scars the minds of other nearby creatures. Each creature within 10 feet of the cackler must succeed on a 11 Wisdom saving throw or take 2 (1d4) psychic damage.

traits.name: Mimicry
traits.desc: The cackler can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful 11 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spiked Chain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

spells: The cackler's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). The cackler can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The krasis can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The krasis makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The krasis can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The krasis makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 17 (2d12 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (2d12 + 4) slashing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The krasis can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The krasis makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its claws, and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 27 (6d6 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) slashing damage.

monsters.name: Conclave Dryad

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The dryad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
traits.desc: The dryad can communicate with beasts and plants as if they and the dryad shared a language.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dryad makes three attacks, using its vine staff, its longbow, or both.

actions.name: Vine Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 17 Dexterity saving throw or become restrained by twisting vines for 1 minute. A target restrained in this way can use an action to make a 17 Strength (Athletics) or Dexterity (Acrobatics) check, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +8 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Summon Mount (1/Day)
actions.desc: The dryad magically summons a mount, which appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the dryad. The mount remains for 8 hours, until it or the dryad dies, or until the dryad dismisses it as an action. The mount uses the stat block of an elk (see the Monster Manual) with these changes: it is a plant instead of a beast, it has an Intelligence of 6, and it understands Sylvan but can't speak. While within 1 mile of the mount, the dryad can communicate with it telepathically.

actions.name: Suppress Magic (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dryad targets one magic item it can see within 120 feet of it. If the magic item isn't an artifact, its magical properties are suppressed for 10 minutes, until the dryad is incapacitated or dies, or until the dryad uses a bonus action to end the effect.

spells: The dryad's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 17). The dryad can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.3/day each: dispel magic, entangle, plant growth, spike growth

spells.1/day each: moonbeam, grasping vine, wall of thorns

monsters.name: Cosmotronic Blastseeker

traits.name: Empowered Spell (3/Day)
traits.desc: When the blastseeker rolls damage for a spell, it can reroll up to four dice of damage. It must use the new dice.

traits.name: Tides of Chaos (1/Day)
traits.desc: The blastseeker makes one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw with advantage.

actions.name: Warhammer
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spells: The blastseeker's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The blastseeker can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components other than its Izzet gear, which doesn't function for others:

monsters.name: Counterflux Blastseeker

traits.name: Counterflux Overcast (Recharge 5-6)
traits.desc: The blastseeker can create an additional effect immediately after casting a spell. Roll a d6 to determine the effect:

The blastseeker creates a 15-foot-radius invisible sphere centered on itself that lasts until the end of its next turn. Creatures in the sphere have disadvantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

The blastseeker creates a 15-foot-radius invisible sphere centered on itself that lasts until the end of its next turn. Creatures in the sphere have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.desc: The lich has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.desc: If damage reduces the lich to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the lich drops to 1 hit point instead.

spells.2nd level (3 slots): Melf's acid arrow, ray of enfeeblement, spider climb, web

spells.3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, bestow curse, fear, vampiric touch

monsters.name: Felidar

traits.name: Bonding
traits.desc: The felidar can magically bond with one creature it can see, right after spending at least 1 hour observing that creature while within 30 feet of it. The bond lasts until the felidar bonds with a different creature or until the bonded creature dies. This bond has the following effects: The felidar and the bonded creature can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 100 feet. The felidar can sense the direction and distance to the bonded creature if they're on the same plane of existence. As an action, the felidar or the bonded creature can sense what the other sees and hears, during which time it loses its own sight and hearing. This effect lasts until the start of its next turn.

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Jarad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: Jarad regains 25 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. He dies only if he starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Spore Infusion
traits.desc: Jarad is surrounded by a cloud of spores. As a bonus action, he can cause the spores to deal 11 (2d10) poison damage to a creature he can see within 10 feet of him.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.desc: Jarad has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.desc: If damage reduces Jarad to 0 hit points, he must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, he drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Jarad makes two attacks: one with his Noxious Touch and one with his Staff of Svogthir. He can cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action in place of one of these attacks.

actions.name: Noxious Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 28 (8d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a 20 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Staff of Svogthir
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) poison damage and 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

legendary_actions.name: Cantrip
legendary_actions.desc: Jarad casts one of his cantrips.

legendary_actions.name: Noxious Touch (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Jarad uses Noxious Touch.

legendary_actions.name: Disrupt Life (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Each creature within 30 feet of Jarad must make a 20 Constitution saving throw, taking 35 (10d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spells: Jarad is a 14th-level Golgari spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 20, +12 to hit with spell attacks). Jarad has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): acid splash, chill touch, mage hand, poison spray, prestidigitation

spells.1st level (4 slots): entangle, ray of sickness, sleep

spells.2nd level (3 slots): Melf's acid arrow, ray of enfeeblement, spider climb, web

spells.3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, plant growth, vampiric touch

monsters.name: Kraul Death Priest

traits.name: Feed on Death
traits.desc: When a creature within 30 feet of the kraul drops to 0 hit points, the kraul or another creature of its choice within 30 feet of it gains 5 (1d10) temporary hit points, provided the kraul isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Hive Mind
traits.desc: The kraul is immune to the charmed and frightened conditions while within 30 feet of at least one other kraul.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The kraul has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kraul's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The kraul can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The kraul makes one attack with its quarterstaff and casts one of its spells with a casting time of 1 action.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spells: The kraul's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The kraul can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.3/day each: ray of enfeeblement, ray of sickness

monsters.name: Kraul Warrior
monsters.languages: Kraul, understands Common but can't speak it

traits.name: Hive Mind
traits.desc: The kraul is immune to the charmed and frightened conditions while within 30 feet of at least one other kraul.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The kraul has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kraul's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The kraul can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

monsters.name: Lawmage

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spells: The lawmage is an 8th-level Azorius spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The lawmage has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, friends, light, message

spells.1st level (4 slots): alarm, expeditious retreat, shield

spells.2nd level (3 slots): arcane lock, detect thoughts, hold person

monsters.name: Lazav
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, psychic

traits.name: Elusive
traits.desc: No attack roll has advantage against Lazav unless he is incapacitated.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Lazav fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Shapechanger Savant
traits.desc: Lazav can use a bonus action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid he has seen. His statistics, other than his size, are the same in each form. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

traits.name: Psychic Defenses
traits.desc: Unless Lazav is incapacitated, he is immune to magic that allows other creatures to read his thoughts, determine whether he is lying, know his alignment, or know his creature type. Creatures can telepathically communicate with Lazav only if he allows it.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Lazav makes three shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d6 + 7) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage, and the target has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before Lazav's next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Lazav makes a weapon attack.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Lazav casts one of his innate spells.

legendary_actions.name: Shifting Nightmare (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Lazav rapidly takes the form of several nightmarish creatures, lashing out at all nearby. Each creature within 10 feet of Lazav must succeed on a 21 Dexterity saving throw or take 18 (4d8) damage of a type chosen by Lazav: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or necrotic.

spells: Lazav's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 20). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: detect thoughts, encode thoughts psychic damage)

monsters.name: Master of Cruelties
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Aura of Blood Lust
traits.desc: When any other creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the master, that creature must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw, or it must immediately take the Attack action, making one melee attack against a random creature within reach. If no creatures are within reach, it makes a ranged attack against a random creature within range, throwing its weapon if necessary.

traits.name: Feed on the Crowd
traits.desc: Whenever a creature within 60 feet of the master dies, the master gains 15 temporary hit points and has advantage on all attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The master has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The master makes two melee attacks with its spear.

actions.name: Spear
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 13 (3d8) psychic damage.

actions.name: Captivating Presence (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Each creature within 120 feet of the master must succeed on a 17 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by the master for 1 hour. While charmed in this way, a creature's speed is 0. If the charmed creature takes damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Captivating Presence of all masters of cruelties for the next 24 hours.

spells: The master's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 17). The master can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

spells.At will: charm person (as a 3rd-level spell), crown of madness

monsters.name: Mind Drinker Vampire
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic
monsters.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the vampire can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in sunlight, the vampire has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. The vampire can also grapple the target (escape 13) if it is a creature and the vampire has a hand free.

actions.name: Mind Siphon (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The vampire targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a 14 Intelligence saving throw, with disadvantage if the vampire has previously consumed the target's blood. On a failed save, the target takes 28 (8d6) psychic damage, and the vampire discerns the target's surface emotions and thoughts. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, and the vampire discerns the target's general emotional state but not its thoughts.

spells: The vampire's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spells.3/day each: charm person, hold person, mirror image, sleep

monsters.name: Mind Mage

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.desc: The mage wears a Spies' Murmur (see chapter 5).

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

spells: The mage's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 16). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spells.3/day each: charm person, detect thoughts, mage armor, sleep, suggestion

spells.1/day each: dominate person, mass suggestion, modify memory

monsters.name: Nightveil Specter
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Mount
traits.desc: If the specter isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto its gloamwing mount, provided the specter and the gloamwing are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the specter appears astride the gloamwing along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying. While mounted and not incapacitated, the specter can't be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}, and both it and its mount gain advantage on Dexterity saving throws.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The specter makes two scythe attacks.

actions.name: Scythe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) psychic damage.

actions.name: Mind Twist (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The specter magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 22 (5d8) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Reap Memory (3/Day)
actions.desc: The specter touches one incapacitated creature and chooses 1 hour from among the past 24. Unless the creature succeeds on a 15 Intelligence saving throw, the creature loses all memory of that hour. The creature regains the memory only if the specter dies within the next 24 hours.

monsters.name: Niv-Mizzet
monsters.damage_resistances: cold, psychic, thunder
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 21

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Niv-Mizzet fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Locus of the Firemind
traits.desc: Niv-Mizzet can maintain {@status concentration} on two different spells at the same time. In addition, he has advantage on saving throws to maintain {@status concentration} on spells.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Niv-Mizzet has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Master Chemister
traits.desc: When Niv-Mizzet casts a spell that deals damage, he can change the spell's damage to cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Niv-Mizzet makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 18 (2d8 + 9) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 14 (2d4 + 9) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 16 (2d6 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Niv-Mizzet exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 25 Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 (26d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Cantrip
legendary_actions.desc: Niv-Mizzet casts one of his cantrips.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.desc: Niv-Mizzet makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Niv-Mizzet beats his wings. Each creature within 15 feet of him must succeed on a 25 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 (2d4 + 9) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. Niv-Mizzet can then fly up to half his flying speed.

legendary_actions.name: Dracogenius (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Niv-Mizzet regains a spell slot of 3rd level or lower.

spells: Niv-Mizzet is a 20th-level Izzet spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 26, +18 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, prestidigitation, ray of frost, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, magic missile, shield, thunderwave, unseen servant

spells.2nd level (3 slots): blur, enlarge/reduce, flaming sphere, hold person, scorching ray

spells.5th level (2 slots): conjure elemental, polymorph, wall of fire, wall of force

spells.8th level (1 slots): control weather, maze, power word stun

monsters.name: Nivix Cyclops
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The cyclops has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The cyclops makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 23 (3d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Spell Vitalization
reactions.desc: Immediately after a creature casts a spell of 1st level or higher within 120 feet of the cyclops, the cyclops can move up to twice its speed without provoking opportunity attacks. It can then make one slam attack against a target of its choice.

monsters.name: Obzedat Ghost
monsters.damage_resistances: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Council of Five
traits.desc: The ghost has a trait based on who it is, as shown below:

traits.name: Enezesku: Enfeebling Ray
traits.desc: Enezesku's Innate Spellcasting trait includes ray of enfeeblement, which he can cast at will.

traits.name: Fautomni: Undead Fortitude
traits.desc: If damage reduces Fautomni to 0 hit points, he must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, Fautomni drops to 1 hit point instead.

traits.name: Karlov: Unnatural Vigor
traits.desc: When Karlov regains hit points, he has advantage on attack rolls he makes on his next turn.

traits.name: Vuliev: Teleportation
traits.desc: Vuliev's Innate Spellcasting trait includes misty step, which he can cast at will.

traits.name: Xil Xaxosz: Lingering Spite
traits.desc: When Xil Xaxosz is reduced to 0 hit points, his incorporeal form explodes in a burst of necrotic energy. Each creature within 5 feet of him must make a 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Ethereal Sight
traits.desc: The ghost can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.desc: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
traits.desc: If the ghost fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 18 (4d8) necrotic damage, and the ghost regains hit points equal to half the amount of damage the target takes. The target must succeed on a 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

actions.name: Convene the Ghost Council
actions.desc: The ghost summons the other four members of the Obzedat. At the start of the ghost's next turn, the other members appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the summoner. The ghosts each roll initiative when they appear.

legendary_actions.name: Forced Obedience
legendary_actions.desc: A target that all of the Obzedat ghosts can see must succeed on a 16 Wisdom saving throw or bow until the end of its next turn. Until this bow ends, the target can't take actions or reactions, and its speed is 0 and can't be increased.

legendary_actions.name: Indentured Spirits (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The Obzedat ghosts conjure 1d6 indentured spirit (described in this chapter) within 60 feet of one of them.

spells: The ghost's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spells.At will: chill touch (at 5th level, and the ghost regains hit points equal to half the amount of damage the target takes)

traits.name: Focus
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the giant can target a creature it can see within 30 feet of it and make that creature its focus. The target remains the giant's focus for 1 minute, or until either the target or the giant drops to 0 hit points. When the giant makes an attack roll against its focus, it adds a d4 to its attack roll. If the giant attacks a different target while it has a focus, it subtracts a d4 from its attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two greataxe attacks.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 25 (3d12 + 6) slashing damage. If the Orzhov giant scores a critical hit, it rolls the damage dice three times, instead of twice.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack +9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

monsters.name: Precognitive Mage

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Glimpse the Temporal Flood (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The mage targets one creature within 120 feet of it that it can see. The target takes 18 (4d8) psychic damage, and it must succeed on a 14 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

reactions.name: Precognitive Insight (3/Day)
reactions.desc: When the mage or a creature it can see makes an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, the mage can cause the roll to be made with advantage or disadvantage.

spells: The mage's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save 14). It can cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

monsters.name: Rakdos
monsters.damage_resistances: necrotic, bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Captivating Presence
traits.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of Rakdos must make a 25 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes charmed by Rakdos for 1 minute or until the creature is farther than 30 feet away from him. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to Rakdos's Captivating Presence for 24 hours.

traits.name: Cruel Entertainment
traits.desc: When a creature Rakdos can see within 60 feet of him is reduced to 0 hit points, Rakdos gains 25 temporary hit points.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If Rakdos fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Rakdos has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: Rakdos's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Rakdos makes two attacks with his Curtain-Call Scythe or his claws.

actions.name: Curtain-Call Scythe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 24 (3d10 + 8) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d8 + 8) slashing damage.

legendary_actions.name: Sadistic Revelry
legendary_actions.desc: Each creature within 60 feet of Rakdos that is his ally or is charmed by him must use its reaction to move up to half its speed toward the creature closest to it that it can see, provided it isn't already within 5 feet of that creature. It then must make one melee attack against that creature if it is able to do so.

legendary_actions.name: Scythe (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Rakdos uses Curtain-Call Scythe.

legendary_actions.name: Touch of Pain (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: Rakdos makes a claw attack against one creature within 10 feet of him. The target must succeed on a 25 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the creature can't maintain {@status concentration} on a spell or any other effect that requires {@status concentration}. The poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spells: Rakdos's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 25). He can innately cast hellish rebuke (at 5th level) at will, requiring no material components.

monsters.name: Rakdos Lampooner

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

spells: The lampooner is a 4th-level Rakdos spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following bard spells:

spells.Cantrips (at will): dancing lights, minor illusion, vicious mockery

spells.1st level (4 slots): bane, dissonant whispers, silent image, Tasha's hideous laughter, thunderwave

traits.name: Nimble
traits.desc: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The juggler makes three dagger attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee / Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Nimble
traits.desc: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
